pages.title: Clockwork Stabilizer
pages.text: The <item>Clockwork Stabilizer/$ is a more advanced version of the <item>$(l:essentials:beam/stabilizer)quartz stabilizer/$ designed for use in high-<thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)power/$ centralized <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beam/$ systems.$(br2)It will store all received <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beams/$, with a maximum storage of 320,000 <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)power/$. It will output 20% of all stored $(l:essentials:intro/beam)beams/$ out the front

each $(l:essentials:intro/beam)cycle/$, with the same color as the total stored $(l:essentials:intro/beam)beam/$.$(br2)This has the effect of 'smoothing' out received <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beams/$, turning pulses into continuous <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)beams/$ and reducing fluctuations in input.$(br2)<item>$(l:essentials/circuits#reader)Circuits/$ measure the total stored <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beam)power/$.$(br2)
